```{r}
library(shiny)

# Load the data
data <- read.csv("../../dataset-ignore/2019-20_pbp.csv")

# Define the user interface for the app
ui <- fluidPage(

  # App title
  titlePanel("NBA Team Stats"),

  # Dropdown menu to select a team
  selectInput("team", "Select a team:",
              choices = data$Team),

  # Output display of the team stats
  tableOutput("stats")
)

# Define the server logic for the app
server <- function(input, output) {

  # Select the team stats for the selected team
  output$stats <- renderTable({
    data[data$Team == input$team, ]
  })
}

# Run the app
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
